title: "Baidu to launch self-driving taxi service in Zhejiang"
excerpt: "Chinese tech giant Baidu Inc said it will offer self-driving taxi service in Wuzhen, Zhejiang province, on Saturday, as part of the company's broader drive to accelerate the large-scale commercialization of autonomous driving technology."
